mention.text: a quarterly magazine which was created for the purpose of enhancing understanding of mainland affairs
The three mainland scholars who contributed

President Chen Shui-bian , Lin Yifu of Beijing University , who wrote on the development of the mainland 's information technology industry , and Ye Zicheng of Beijing University , who wrote on the interchanges between -LRB- mainland -RRB- China and the United States and their effect on cross-Taiwan Strait relations
Beijing University , who wrote on the interchanges between -LRB- mainland -RRB- China and the United States and their effect on cross-Taiwan Strait relations
Beijing University , who wrote on the development of the mainland 's information technology industry
an adviser to Wang Daohan , mainland China 's top negotiator
deputy director of the DPP 's Department of Chinese Affairs and a major advisor on President Chen 's seven-point statement on cross-strait relations
professor of Tamkang University and a DPP adviser
Professor Lee Kuo-hsiung of National Chengchi University
